articles.title: Ri Thae Nam Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Ri Thae Nam Meets Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Ri Thae Nam, vice-premier of the DPRK, Tuesday met and had a talk with the delegation of the Jilin Provincial People's Government of China headed by its Vice-Governor Chen Weigen which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Jilin Provincial People's Government of China on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Vice-Governor Chen Weigen, head of the delegation, handed over the gift to Vice-Premier Ri Thae Nam on Tuesday.

articles.title: Talks between WPK and Tunisia PUP Held
articles.content:
Talks between WPK and Tunisia PUP Held
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Talks between delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the People's Unity Party of Tunisia were held here on Tuesday.
					Present there from the Korean side were Department Director Kim Yong Il and other officials of the WPK Central Committee and from the opposite side the delegation headed by Secretary General Mohamed Bouchiha.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their parties' activities and exchanged views on further development of the relations between the two parties and matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Gift from Tunisia PUP Leader
articles.content:
Gift from Tunisia PUP Leader
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the secretary general of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Secretary General Mohamed Bouchiha conveyed the gift to Kim Yong Il, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Releases Joint Statement on Anniversary of 6.15
articles.content:
DPRK Releases Joint Statement on Anniversary of 6.15
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The political parties and organizations of the DPRK released a joint statement Tuesday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The statement said that the June 15 joint declaration the keynote of which is the idea of "By our nation itself" is a programme for reunification in the new century as it clarified the most correct principle, orientation and ways for settling the reunification issue and a supreme banner of reunification as it comprehensively represents the general will of the nation and all the agreements reached between the north and the south in the past.
					
					 The statement denounced the present conservative regime of south Korea for having trampled underfoot the June 15 joint declaration and persistently blocked its implementation while desperately pursuing sycophancy and treachery and confrontation with fellow countrymen, thereby driving the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe.
					
					  The puppet group's frantic moves for confrontation and war are aimed at effacing the June 15 joint declaration from the minds of the south Korean people and leaving it forgotten for good, it noted.
					
					 The political parties and organizations of the DPRK in their statement clarify the following principled stand to tide over the prevailing situation:
					
					 Firstly, it is of the utmost necessity to respect and thoroughly implement the north-south joint declaration, the nation's supreme programme for reunification.
					
					 Secondly, we will join hands with whoever upholds and supports the north-south joint declaration, not questioning about his or her party affiliation, political view and past doings but never pardon those who negate, defile and violate it.
					
					 Thirdly, the United States should neither obstruct the implementation of the joint declaration nor interfere in the issue of the Korean nation and the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 When all the Koreans turn out as one in a nationwide great and sacred struggle for reunification, valiantly meeting the challenges of the anti-reunification forces by their concerted efforts under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration, the gate to national reunification, their cherished desire, will be flung open, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The June 15 cause of justice is sure to triumph despite ordeals, difficulties, turns and twists and the Korean nation will surely realize the centuries-old desire for national reunification before long under the sunrays of great Songun.
					
					 The political parties and organizations of the DPRK will as ever discharge to the last the historical mission and honorable duty they assumed before the era and the nation.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we express expectation and conviction that international organizations and governments, political parties and organizations of all countries desirous of peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula would extend positive support and encouragement to the will and efforts of the Korean nation to check and frustrate the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group's moves for confrontation and war, uphold and implement the June 15 joint declaration and achieve the reunification of the country as early as possible.

articles.title: 6.15 North Side's Committee Meets Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
6.15 North Side's Committee Meets Han Sang Ryol
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration met Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification figure of south Korea, at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday.
					 An Kyong Ho, chairman of the North Side Committee, spoke highly of the deeds of Han who participated in the events to mark the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration after coming to Pyongyang at the risk of his life.
					
					 At the meeting the participants recalled the achievements gained in the ten-year-long efforts for national reunification and prosperity common to the nation in the wake of the historic inter-Korean summit meeting and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 After the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime the declaration has been totally denied and big hurdles stand in the way of the struggle for reconciliation, unity and reunification of the nation, they said, adding: All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas should smash the moves of the separatists at home and abroad and wage an active nation-wide reunification movement under the banner of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: Han Sang Ryol Participates in Special Church Service
articles.content:
Han Sang Ryol Participates in Special Church Service
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a pro-reunification figure of south Korea, on a visit to Pyongyang Sunday participated in the "special church service for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and peace and reunification" at the Pongsu Church on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration. 
					 Attending it were officials of the Christian Federation of Korea, believers in the city of Pyongyang and overseas Korean believers on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Panmunjom
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Panmunjom
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of embassies of various countries here visited Panmunjom on Tuesday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and 60 years after the outbreak of the Korean war by the U.S. imperialists. 
					  The guests went round the monument to the signature of President Kim Il Sung conveying the undying feats he performed in the sacred cause of putting an end to the tragedy of national division and achieving the country's reunification.  
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the army and people of the DPRK under the leadership of the President defeated the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' armed invasion, thus winning a shining victory, they looked round the meeting room of armistice talks, the hall where the armistice agreement was signed and the meeting room of the former Military Armistice Commission. 
					
					 They also saw the concrete wall built in the area south of the Military Demarcation Line.

articles.title: Letter from AINDF
articles.content:
Letter from AINDF
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Tuesday, the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The letter described the historic Pyongyang summit and the birth of the June 15 joint declaration in June ten years ago, which put all Koreans and the whole world in excitement, as a brilliant fruition of the distinguished Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, the peerless patriot, and his noble will for reunification and a great event to be specially recorded in the history of the nation.
					
					 It noted that he provided another historic Pyongyang summit in October 2007 and adopted the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity", a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, and thus put the June 15 era of reunification on a new higher stage, instilling all the compatriots with great confidence and hope for reunification.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 You saw to it that initiative and bold measures were taken one after another to improve the inter-Korean relations getting worse due to desperate confrontation moves of the pro-U.S. conservative ruling forces, and this year inspiringly encouraged all Koreans to the struggle for glorifying the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Our people are replete with optimism and confidence that our country is sure to be reunified into one despite the anti-reunification storm as there are you who are demonstrating the dignity of the nation to the whole world and ushering in the greatest heyday of building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the great banner of Songun and the June 15 joint declaration, a signpost of national reunification.
					
					 The AINDF will wage the vigorous struggle to defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, invariably holding them high as the immortal banners of independent reunification, peace and prosperity, resolutely frustrate the moves of the pro-U.S. conservative forces swimming against them and bring about a new phase for independent reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself", the letter stressed.

articles.title: Letter from Chongryon
articles.content:
Letter from Chongryon
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Tuesday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Kim Jong Il provided the historic North-South Summit Meeting in Pyongyang by making a great bold patriotic decision ten years ago, solemnly announcing at home and abroad the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a programme for reunification common to the nation which reflects the desire and aspiration of all the compatriots, the letter noted, adding that this was an immortal exploit which will always remain shining in the history of the reunification movement of the Korean nation.
					
					 The letter continued: The June 15 joint declaration, a milestone of national reunification in the 21st century, provided by you helped put an end to the history of distrust and confrontation which has lasted for more than half a century and ushered in a stirring era of June 15 in which Koreans are dynamically paving the way for independent reunification by pooling efforts by our nation itself. It also brought about such exciting events in which the severed blood ties of the nation and the cut-off rail and road links were rejoined and astonishing events of reconciliation, unity, cooperation and exchange unimaginable in the past. 
					
					The precious achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification are the shinning fruition of the personality of you as a great man born of Heaven and the extraordinary political caliber of you who have led the struggle for national reunification to victory with your invincible Songun leadership and all-embracing patriotic politics with your fixed will for reunification to carry out without fail President Kim Il Sung's instructions for national reunification. 
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will make a tangible contribution to achieving national reunification by the concerted efforts of the whole nation true to your idea and intention, enshrining the faith in sure victory that the country's reunification is sure to be achieved and a bright future of the nation is in safe hands as long as they are led by you, the letter said, and emphasized: 
					
					 We will arouse broad strata of compatriots in Japan to the cause of national reunification by getting united with the "Mindan"-lining compatriots and compatriots of various other strata under the banner of "By our nation itself" and conduct an international movement positively supporting our nation's cause of independent reunification among the progressive people of Japan and other countries of the world.

articles.title: Capacity of Taedonggang Fruit Farm Expanded
articles.content:
Capacity of Taedonggang Fruit Farm Expanded
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm in the Wonhung area of Pyongyang has increased its capacity five times.  
					In a matter of several months soldiers of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces have completed a huge project of rezoning hundreds of hectares, building roads and waterways extending scores of kilometers, digging trench-shaped pits of over 1,600 kilometers, setting up hundreds of thousands of tree-propping stakes and planting millions of fruit trees. They have also built modern fruit storing and processing facilities.
					
					 The farm, with well-arranged and vast orchards, ring-shaped roads and waterways and fruit tree nurseries, has put fruit farming on a scientific, intensive and modern basis. 
					
					 The fruit storehouse with the capacity of several thousand tons is operated by computer, while the dried apple slices factory is streamlined.
					
					 The apple slices are turned out through such processes as washing, separation, hot-air drying and vacuum frying and finally packed. 
					
					 When the rapidly progressing construction of a pig farm is finished, a cyclic system of fruit and stock farming will be established with large quantities of organic compound fertilizers from the pig farm being applied to orchards.
					
					Recently, General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the fruit farm again and said with pride that such a large-scale fruit farm as the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm could be constructed only in the DPRK, a socialist country based on collectivism.

articles.title: Makkoli, Traditional Drink
articles.content:
Makkoli, Traditional Drink
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Makkoli is a favorite drink of the Korean people.
					 The crude liquor is served at many public catering establishments in Pyongyang, including restaurants in Changgwang Street and Pothonggang District.
					
					 Different areas of the country boast of Makkoli made with their special pharmaceuticals. 
					
					 Makkoli has a long history in the country.
					
					 It, made by fermenting grains, was developed to be a popular drink in ancient times. 
					
					 It was diversified in kind and brewing method through the periods of three kingdoms (Koguryo, Paekje and Silla), Koryo and the Ri Dynasty. 
					
					 The drink is mainly divided into three kinds -- high-grade Makkoli made of rice and fine malt, ordinary Makkoli made of grains, their bran and malt, and medicinal Makkoli made with Koryo medicines.
					
					 The refreshing drink has a mix of sweet and sour tastes. 
					
					  It, easy in the brewing method and short in the brewing period, has a peculiar flavor and contains many nutritive ingredients.

articles.title: KCNA Marks 10th Anniversary of Inter-Korean Declaration
articles.content:
KCNA Marks 10th Anniversary of Inter-Korean Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency made public a detailed report titled "Those swimming against the June 15 era of reunification are bound to face a stern punishment by the nation" on Monday, one day before the 10th anniversary of the historic North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The following is the gist of the report:
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration, provided by the north and the south of Korea at the outset of the 2000s, is a grand milestone and an immortal great programme for reunification as it brightened the prospect of the nation while fully reflecting its will and desire for reunification.
					
					 The publication of the declaration made the atmosphere of reunification prevail all over the country. Severed blood vein and territory were reconnected, the tour of Mt. Kumgang launched on a full scale and the Kaesong Industrial Zone developed, thus bringing great pleasure to all Koreans.
					
					 But the inter-Korean relations have been bedeviled uncontrollably since the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors came to power in south Korea in Feb. 2008.
					
					 In a little more than two years since its seizure of office, the Lee group, keen on the sycophancy toward the U.S. and the scheme to stifle the fellow countrymen, brought the north-south relations to a total collapse. Its deliberate and systematic moves against reunification are the hideous treachery that can never be pardoned.
					
					 The group of traitors totally denied the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, its action programme, and turned the inter-Korean relations back to the relationship of acute confrontation.
					
					 At the "presidential inauguration ceremony" traitor Lee Myung Bak set forth the watchword "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" as the "policy towards the north". This is a vicious policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen intended to stile the DPRK, a version of the U.S. policy towards the DPRK which is aimed to disable the DPRK's nuclear weapons and bring "change" in its system and thus topple it. 
					
					 Pursuant to this policy, the group of traitors slandered and nullified the historic declarations the keynote of which is "By our nation itself", the idea of national independence, as soon as it took office.
					
					 It was, in fact, a revelation of the sinister intention to deprive the south Korean people of their spiritual mainstay for reunification movement and hamstring the nationwide progress of the June 15 era for independence, peace and great national unity.
					
					 Traitor Lee told at a press conference in the U.S. that "the ultimate goal is to achieve the unification under the system of liberal democracy", thus revealing his ulterior intention for "confrontation in systems" and "unification of systems".
					
					 In order to put into practice the "policy toward the north" the traitorous clique came out as a shock-brigade in carrying out the U.S. scheme to stifle the DPRK with two main levers--the nuclear issue and the "human rights issue".
					
					 The group of traitors has frantically pushed ahead with the preparations for a war against the DPRK in league with the U.S., claiming that to secure the "military superiority over the north" is the shortest way to lead the DPRK to "abandonment of nuclear program first" and "reform and opening".
					
					 It brought the inter-Korean dialogue and cooperation to total suspension by employing conspiratorial and deceptive tricks.
					
					 It has intensified the frantic moves for confrontation with the DPRK, thus spoiling the atmosphere of dialogue. After all, such actions led to closure the Red Cross liaison office in Panmunjom, which had been kept for several decades since the outset of 1970s, and the direct phones, which had been used as communication means between the north and the south, to severance.
					
					 The group also put a ban on the June 15 joint events for reunification, which had been regularly held between the north and the south, and meetings for reunification between people of different circles from the north and the south, including the May Day joint event of workers.
					
					 After laying down the "four principles on the work with the north", the Lee group suspended the inter-Korean cooperation projects and cut off the south Koreans' tour of Mt. Kumgang under the pretext of the "case of Mt. Kumgang tourist" that occurred in July 2008. 
					
					 Though the DPRK showed its positive willingness and decision for improved inter-Korean relations, dialogue and cooperation, the group of traitors turned down all the affirmative proposals of the DPRK and frustrated even the non-governmental exchange and cooperation, bringing up groundless conditionality. It asserted that neither improvement of relations nor cooperation between the north and the south can be expected unless the nuclear issue is settled and there can be no "contact only for meeting."
					
					  Later, the group worked out the very provocative scenario for war of aggression on the DPRK called "Emergency Ruling Plan-Puhung" and has made desperate efforts to carry it into practice.
					
					 Since the case of sinking of the south Korean puppet navy's warship occurred in March this year, the group of traitors has made every possible effort to use this case to tide over its serious political crisis by turning the atmosphere of the "elections to local self-governing bodies" favorable for it and isolate and stifle the DPRK internationally.
					
					 But the above-said elections resulted in giving a stern judgment of the south Korean people to the traitors going against the trend of the times.
					
					 History has already sentenced to death the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors equal to the "five traitors of 1905", branding them as "group of traitors in 2010". The group is bound to meet its destruction anytime.
					
					 Definite are the validity and invincibility of the June 15 joint declaration, the supreme reunification programme of the nation, as it comprehends all Koreans' aspiration and desire and its scientific accuracy and truth are guaranteed.
					
					 The grand march of the June 15 era vigorously advancing under the banner of "By our nation itself" can never be checked no matter how frantically such reactionaries of history as the Lee Myung Bak clique of traitors may try, and the nation's cherished desire for reunification will be surely realized in the near future.

articles.title: Newspapers Mark Anniversary of 6.15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Newspapers Mark Anniversary of 6.15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Leading papers today dedicate editorials to the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, which call for realizing the cause of peace and independent reunification of the country under the banner of the joint declaration.
					 Rodong Sinmun notes that a clear landmark was set for national reunification in the new century and a reunification programme common to the nation in the 21st century, which carries the most just principles and ways for the independent and peaceful reunification, provided with the publication of the joint declaration. It also brought about the June 15 era of reunification, a new historic era in the Korean nation's history of reunification movement, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The last decade since the publication of the joint declaration was a period of significance in which the validity and vitality of the declaration were clearly proven and all the Koreans cherished the truth that to defend and implement the declaration is essential for the development of the inter-Korean relations and peace and reunification of the country.
					
					The birth of the June 15 era of reunification and its dynamic advance gave all Koreans the unshakable faith that General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the father of the nation and the lodestar of the independent reunification.
					
					 The past ten years, during which the Koreans' will for independent reunification was strikingly demonstrated, is woven with the traces of Kim Jong Il's wise leadership.
					
					 Boundless is the pride and self-esteem of the Korean nation holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its prominent leader, and all Koreans are firmly convinced that the cause of national reunification is sure to emerge victorious when they follow the road indicated by him.
					
					 The last ten year-long history of the movement for national reunification and the present reality eloquently prove that the implementation of the inter-Korean declarations and the prospect of national reunification depend on the vigorous struggle against the separatist and warlike forces at home and abroad.
					
					 All Koreans should reliably defend the idea of "By our nation itself" from all sorts of separatist sophism and make the patriotic enthusiasm and stamina to achieve the independent reunification in that spirit prevail all over the country. And they should put an end to the foreign forces' interference and domination over south Korea and resolutely frustrate the south Korean puppet authorities' policy of confrontation against reunification.
					
					 All the compatriots in the north and the south of Korea and overseas should intensify the anti-war peace struggle, getting closely united under the banner of the national reunification, irrespective of ideology, ism and system.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that they should hold fast to the June 15 joint declaration and conduct a more vigorous struggle to thoroughly implement it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands "Cheonan" Case as Farce by US
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands "Cheonan" Case as Farce by US
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The case of sinking of south Korean warship "Cheonan" was a poor farce invented by the United States from A to Z, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed commentary.
					 There is no proper ground for the U.S. assertion that the south Korean warship was "attacked" by the DPRK's torpedo, it points out, and says:
					
					 Development presupposes peace, and peaceful environment is more urgently needed for the DPRK which is now making an all-out offensive to open the gate to a thriving nation till 2012.
					
					 In the light of common sense, it is clear that the DPRK wishing for the peaceful reunification of the country had nothing to do with the said case. A man of reason can easily understand that the case got the DPRK nowhere. That is why the world community has thrown big doubt about the attempt to link the case with the DPRK.
					
					 Recently, the relocation of the U.S. military base in Okinawa, an issue causing trouble between the U.S. and Japan, came to a settlement with a blitz. This goes to prove that the U.S. is the backstage manipulator and criminal chiefly responsible for the case.
					
					 The relocation was vital to the U.S. because this problem was related to the prospect of its Asia-Pacific strategy as well as U.S.-Japan alliance.
					
					 When taken into consideration what role the Futenma U.S. airfield station in Okinawa plays in the U.S. Asia strategy for aggression, anyone can guess with ease that the U.S. might concoct a shocking case enough to create an atmosphere of "security crisis" in a bid to maintain the said base.
					
					 It is not without reason that these days there have been raised such public opinion that the U.S. has tactfully used the warship sinking case to put Japan and south Korea under its tight military control and lay a siege and contain China and assertions that the case was caused by attack of the U.S. marines. 
					
					 The U.S. ruling quarters left no means untried to conduct an operation aimed at politically ostracizing the Hatoyama regime, but in vain. Finally, they brought down the Hatoyama group by inventing the farce as a pretext for "security crisis" that the warship "Cheonan" was sunken by "torpedo of north Korea."
					
					 The U.S. does not hesitate to victimize its aggressor troops for aggression and war against other countries. Therefore, anyone can easily realize that it would have not been difficult for the U.S. to reduce to victims to the conspiratorial case the south Korean soldiers it regards as a mere cannon fodder. 
					
					 The plot-breeders are bound to put in the dock of the international court anytime.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams US Drone Attack
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams US Drone Attack
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A UN special rapporteur in a report submitted to the UN Human Rights Council shortly ago slammed the U.S. drone attack for causing civilian deaths. The report branded the "target killing operation" as a "killing permit devoid of responsibility", urging the U.S. to stop the drone attack at once.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. "drone warfare" is a new form of a war of aggression and man slaughter in apparent contravention of international law and the humanitarian principle.
					
					 This war is aimed to intensify military attack on the anti-U.S. resistant forces in a bid to make up for its failure in the "war on terrorism" and attain its strategic purpose at the sacrifice of a great number of civilians and, at the same time, cut down the loss of its forces and calm down the criticism of the government running high in the U.S.
					
					 It is precisely for this reason that the U.S. encourages "drone warfare" and intensifies the drone attack defying the protest and condemnation by the international community while putting spurs to the development and production of modern drones.
					
					 Damage done by U.S. drones is on the daily increase in world hotspots as evidenced by ever-rising death toll of civilians and cities and villages turning to debris.
					
					 The horrible consequences of the "drone warfare" clearly prove that the U.S. is a chieftain of man slaughter.
					
					 The U.S. persistent "drone warfare" will precipitate its self-destruction.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the world is becoming increasingly assertive in condemning the U.S. as the worst human rights abuser and calling for bringing the U.S. to the international human rights justice.

articles.title: Traitors' Policy for Escalating Confrontation Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Traitors' Policy for Escalating Confrontation Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and social organizations of south Korea including the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Solidarity for Progress and the Federation of Peasants Associations, representatives of opposition parties and citizens from all walks of life held an "all-people rally for peace and reunification marking the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration" in Seoul on June 13. 
					 Speakers at the rally accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of having totally denied the idea of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration supported by all the Koreans and world people and fanned up political and military confrontation with the DPRK from the outset of its seizure of power.
					
					 In particular, the authorities are getting hell-bent on the war moves aimed at exterminating the nation and a racket for applying sanctions against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces with the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking as a momentum, thus escalating the tension between the south and the north and increasing the danger of a war, they noted.
					
					 They urged the authorities to retract the policy of confrontation with the DPRK and opt for implementing the joint declarations.
					
					 It is necessary to certainly implement the June 15 joint declaration, a milestone of reunification, at any cost, they said, calling upon all the people to wage a dynamic struggle against the Lee "government" which turns down the demand of the people and threatens reunification and peace.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Campaign Accused
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Campaign Accused 
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a statement on June 3 in denunciation of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' escalated anti-DPRK campaign.
					 The statement branded the assertions made by them to forcibly link the case of sinking of warship "Cheonan" with the DPRK as a fabrication without any clear and convincible evidence and as a plot of those standing against the reunification of Korea.
					
					 The said case was a product of the hostile policy pursued by the U.S. which seeks to stifle the DPRK by disturbing peace and security and screwing up tension on the Korean Peninsula, it pointed out, saying:
					
					 We call upon the world progressives who set store by peace to vehemently condemn the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for getting evermore pronounced in their aggression moves with the case as a pretext.
					
					 Meanwhile, protests against the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities' anti-DPRK moves were staged outside the U.S. and south Korean consulates general in Vladivostok, Russia, on June 3 and 4. Participating in them were personages of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Vladivostok City Committee of the Young Communist League of the Russian Federation.
					
					The protestors were carrying DPRK flags and placards reading "The DPRK is with us" and "The U.S., don't play with fire, don't provoke a war!" They disclosed that the case of warship sinking was aimed only to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 An appeal and a statement demanding stop to blackmail against the DPRK were made public at the demonstrations.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Venezuela carried in its organ Tribuna Popular dated May 30 a poster denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group's anti-DPRK aggression moves and distributed copies of it to different parts in Caracas.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Pakistan and lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Iran and India between June 4 and 8 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venues were works of Kim Jong Il and photos on his immortal feats. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said at the meeting that in the DPRK all the people are united with one idea around their leader and are pushing ahead with the drive to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il holding fast to the ideology.
					
					 The secretary general of the International Taekwon-Do Association of Iran said in a lecture that Kim Jong Il has conducted the party building and activities as planned and intended by President Kim Il Sung and in his own way, steadfastly holding fast to the Juche idea authored by the President as the guiding idea of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK led by Kim Jong Il will as ever demonstrate its might as the invincible party, he stressed.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.
					
					 Meanwhile, Miriam Pellegrini Ferri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, released a statement titled "The WPK, the great revolutionary party" on June 7 on the same occasion.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- One day in August Juche 67 (1978) President Kim Il Sung provided field guidance to Pobu-ri, then Kaechon County, South Phyongan Province.
					 Going round a cornfield, he happened to see a cornstalk with withered leaves.
					
					 He stepped into the field and carefully checked the cornstalk. He then peeled the husk and looked at the ear to find what he had paid close attention to.
					
					 Back from his guidance tour, he summoned some senior officials of the agricultural sector. He told them to mobilize agricultural experts to find out the reason of the wilt, indicating scientific and technical issues arising in the campaign.
					
					 After several days, he met agricultural scientists to listen to their suggestions for preventing damage from blights. He said slaked lime and calcium fertilizer should be applied to cornfields to exterminate blights.
					
					 His instructions were based on his long-time observation of the wilt and systematic research for protecting crops from harmful insects.

Conversan en Pyongyang las delegaciones del PTC y del PUPT
  Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- Sostuvieron conversaciones el dia 15 en esta capital las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Partido de Unidad Popular de Tunez.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el jefe de departamento Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC y por la otra, la delegacion del Partido de Unidad Popular de Tunez presidida por su secretario general Mouhammad Bouchiha.

articles.title: Partidos politicos y entidades llaman a abrir las puertas de reunificacion
articles.content:
Partidos politicos y entidades llaman a abrir las puertas de reunificacion
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) --   En ocasion del X aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, fue publicada el dia 15 la declaracion conjunta de los partidos politicos y entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, cuyo nucleo es el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", deviene el programa de reunificacion del nuevo siglo que ilumino claramente los principios, la direccion y los remedios mas correctos por la solucion del problema de reunificacion y la bandera de reunificacion que sintetizo la voluntad general de la nacion y todos los acuerdos Norte-Sur alcanzados en el pasado.
					
					Comienza asi la declaracion y continua:
					
					Al recurrir obstinadamente al servilismo a Estados Unidos y la confrontacion fratricida, el actual "poder" conservador del Sur de Corea pisoteo la declaracion arriba mencionada e impidio a toda costa su ejecucion llevando a la ruptura las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Los freneticos movimientos de la banda titere surcoreana en busca del enfrentamiento y la guerra tienen por su meta borrar para siempre la referida declaracion del alma de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					  Para superar las dificultades creadas, los partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC exponen la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					  Primero, hay que dar respetar con preferencia la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur, maximo programa de reunificacion de la nacion, y ejecutarla a cabalidad. 
					
					  Segundo, avanzaremos tomados de la mano con todos los que defiendan y apoyen la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur independientemente de su militancia, criterio politico y expediente del pasado, pero no perdonaremos jamas a los que la nieguen, insulten y pisoteen.
					
					  Tercero, EE.UU. no debe impedir la ejecucion de la citada declaracion ni intervenir en los asuntos nacionales de Corea y las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Cuando toda la nacion coreana se levante como un solo hombre en la gran causa pannacional de reunificacion rechazando valientemente con la fuerza unida bajo la bandera del 15 de Junio el desafio de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion, se abriran de par en par las puertas a la reunificacion de la patria ansiada por todos los coreanos.
					
					  Pese a las pruebas, dificultades y vicisitudes, la justa causa del 15 de Junio triunfara sin falta y la nacion coreana lograra a toda costa en el futuro no lejano su deseo del siglo de la reunificacion de la patria en virtud de la gran politica de Songun.
					
					  Tambien en el futuro al igual que en el pasado, los partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC seguiran cumpliendo hasta el final con su mision historica y honroso deber asumidos ante la epoca y la nacion. 
					
					  Aprovechando esta ocasion, expresamos la esperanza y conviccion de que las organizaciones internacionales, los gobiernos, los partidos politicos y las entidades de todos los paises del mundo que desean la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana, enviaran su activo apoyo y respaldo a la voluntad y los esfuerzos de la nacion coreana por frustrar las maniobras de enfrentamiento y guerra de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, mantener y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y lograr lo mas pronto posible la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Tiene lugar encuentro con el pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
Tiene lugar encuentro con el pastor surcoreano Han Sang Ryol 
						
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) --  Tuvo lugar este martes en el Hotel Coryo de Pyongyang el encuentro entre los miembros del comite norteno para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el pastor surcoreano pro-reunificacion Han Sang Ryol.
					El presidente del citado comite An Kyong Ho evaluo altamente la conducta del pastor Han quien vino a Pyongyang, a riesgo de su vida, para tomar parte en el acto conmemorativo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					En la ocasion los participantes recordaron que durante el ultimo decenio que data de la historica Cumbre Norte-Sur y de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, se han alcanzado exitos en las labores por la reunificacion de la patria y la coprosperidad nacional. 
					
					Desde que hizo su aparicion, el "poder" de Lee Myung Bak se niega totalmente a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y crea graves escollos en la lucha nacional por la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion, criticaron y apuntaron que todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben desplegar con dinamismo el movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion frustrando bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" las maniobras de los divisionistas internos y externos.

articles.title: Periodicos abogan por enarbolar la bandera de Declaracion Conjunta N-S
articles.content:
Periodicos abogan por enarbolar la bandera de Declaracion Conjunta N-S
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- Los periodicos centrales, en sus editoriales de hoy dedicados al 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, subrayan la necesidad de  realizar la causa por la paz y la reunificacion independiente del pais con la bandera de la declaracion conjunta Norte-Sur en alto.
					Con la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta, se establecio el claro jalon de la reunificacion de la patria en el nuevo siglo, se preparo el programa comun de la reunificacion de la nacion del siglo 21, que refleja los mas justos principios y medios de la reunificacion independiente y pacifica, y se abrio la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de junio, nueva epoca en la historia del movimiento de la nacion coreana por la reunificacion de la patria, senala el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					Los 10 anos pasados, que datan de la publicacion de la citada Declaracion, fueron los dias significativos en que fueron comprobadas claramente la justeza y la vitalidad de esta declaracion y fue guardada profundamente en el corazon de todos los coreanos la verdad de que en mantenerla y ejecutarla residen el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur, la paz y la reunificacion del pais.
					
					El nacimiento de la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de junio y su avance vigoroso infundieron a todos los coreanos la firme conviccion de que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il es precisamente el padre de la nacion y salvador de la reunificacion independiente.
					
					En los dias de 10 anos pasados en que se manifesto firmemente la voluntad de la nacion coreana de reunificar la patria de manera independiente, estan inscritas las huellas de la sabia direccion del Dirigente.
					
					Hoy dia, son infinitos el orgullo y la dignidad de la nacion coreana que goza de la guia del destacado Dirigente y todos los coreanos guardan en el corazon la inconmovible fe en que al avanzar por el camino indicado por el Dirigente es cierta la victoria de la causa de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La historia del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria de 10 anos pasados y la realidad de hoy prueban elocuentemente que la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y la perspectiva de la reunificacion de la patria dependen de la dinamica  lucha contra las fuerzas belicas internas y externas anti-reunificacion.
					
					Todos los coreanos deben defender estrictamente el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" desde los sofismas anti-reunificacion de toda indole, hacer predominar en todo el territorio el entusiasmo e impetu patrioticos de lograr la reunificacion independiente con aquel ideal, poner fin a la dominacion e intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas en el Sur de Corea y frustrar rotundamente las maquinaciones de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas contra la reunificacion y por el enfrentamiento.
					
					Los coreanos de distintos sectores y capas del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben librar energicamente la lucha antibelica y por la paz uniendose solidamente bajo la bandera de la reunificacion de la patria por encima de las diferencias de ideas, ideales y regimenes.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson destaca que todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben desplegar con dinamismo la lucha por materializar cabalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
